QuestData.Title: The 109th Division
QuestData.Description: General Angerforge and Golem Lord Argelmach are directly responsible for the horrific slaughter of the 109th Division of the Kargath Expeditionary Force. There were a lot of good trolls and orcs in that division, many of them my close friends.$B$BWell, young $r, it's time for our fallen brothers to at last have their revenge.$B$BUnlock The Shadowforge Lock, go up the stairs and bear left until you reach the West Garrison. Kill Angerforge and Argelmach, and don't you dare show them any mercy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill General Angerforge and Golem Lord Argelmach.
